security_audit.summary: Documentation-only skill containing CoinGecko API reference materials. No executable code, scripts, or binaries detected. Pure markdown content poses no security risk to users.

content.user_title: Get cryptocurrency prices and market data
content.value_statement: Building crypto applications requires reliable market data. CoinGecko provides comprehensive cryptocurrency prices, market cap, volume, and onchain DEX analytics through a well-documented API. This skill gives AI assistants instant access to all CoinGecko API endpoints and best practices.
actual_capabilities: Query current and historical cryptocurrency prices
Get market cap, trading volume, and price changes
Access NFT collection data and floor prices
Retrieve exchange and derivatives market information
Query onchain DEX data through GeckoTerminal
Get trending coins, pools, and market categories
limitations: Requires CoinGecko API key for full access (free demo tier available)
Rate limits apply based on API plan
Some advanced endpoints require paid subscription
Real-time WebSocket data requires Analyst plan or higher

use_cases.title: Build crypto price trackers
use_cases.description: Integrate real-time cryptocurrency prices and market data into trading bots, dashboards, and portfolio apps.

use_cases.title: Analyze onchain DEX activity
use_cases.description: Query token prices, liquidity pools, and trading activity across 200+ blockchain networks through GeckoTerminal.

use_cases.title: Power crypto AI assistants
use_cases.description: Give AI agents comprehensive knowledge of CoinGecko API to build intelligent crypto trading and research tools.

prompt_templates.title: Get coin price
prompt_templates.prompt: What is the current price of Bitcoin in USD? Show me the 24-hour price change and market cap.

prompt_templates.title: Compare tokens
prompt_templates.prompt: Compare the top 5 DeFi tokens by market cap. Include their prices, 24h volume, and market cap.

prompt_templates.title: Analyze trends
prompt_templates.prompt: What are the top 10 trending coins on CoinGecko in the last 24 hours? Show their price movements.

prompt_templates.title: Onchain research
prompt_templates.prompt: Find the top 10 liquidity pools on Ethereum by trading volume. Include the token pairs and liquidity amounts.

output_examples.input: What is the current price of Bitcoin and Ethereum?

best_practices: Use CoinGecko API keys stored securely in your backend, never expose them in client-side code
Cache API responses where possible to stay within rate limits
Use the Headers method (x-cg-pro-api-key) instead of query parameters for better security
Implement proper error handling for rate limit responses (HTTP 429)
anti_patterns: Exposing API keys in frontend code or public repositories
Making excessive API calls without caching or rate limit handling
Using query string parameters instead of headers for authentication
Ignoring stale price data checks for time-sensitive applications

faq.question: Is CoinGecko API free to use?
faq.answer: Yes, a free Demo API provides limited access. Paid plans unlock higher rate limits and more endpoints.

faq.question: How do I get an API key?
faq.answer: Sign up at coingecko.com/en/api/pricing to generate a Demo or Pro API key from the developer dashboard.

faq.question: What programming languages work with CoinGecko?
faq.answer: CoinGecko offers official Python and TypeScript SDKs. Any language with HTTP support can use the REST API.

faq.question: Can I get real-time price updates?
faq.answer: Yes, WebSocket subscriptions are available for Analyst plan subscribers and above for live price streams.

faq.question: What blockchain networks are supported for onchain data?
faq.answer: Over 200 networks including Ethereum, Solana, BSC, Polygon, Arbitrum, Base, and more through GeckoTerminal.

faq.question: How does this compare to other crypto APIs?
faq.answer: CoinGecko provides independent, comprehensive data with no exchange dependencies. Known for reliable free tier and quality documentation.
